mapper.select: SELECT a.id, ref1, a.creator, title, a.timeUpdate, `text`, numReply, numLike, a.numStart, numStart, `type`, u.`name` FROM article a LEFT JOIN `user` u ON a.`creator` = u.`id` WHERE cat1 = #{cat1} AND ref2 = 0 AND draft = 0 AND audit = 0 AND form = 0 AND delFlag = 0 ORDER BY numStart DESC, id DESC LIMIT #{startIndex}, 10
